member.remarks: If name is used as part of search query, it needs to be at least three characters long. Name search parameter is interpreted as wild card search, so it may appear anywhere in the clan name.

member.summary: Creates a dictionary according to the values in the struct's properties.

member.summary: Cursors indicating which page you're on this specific request.

member.name: M:SharpOfClans.Paging.PagingExtensions.NextPage(SharpOfClans.Paging.Paging)
member.summary: Creates a paging filter with the marker for the next page.
member.param: The paging returned by a previous endpoint call.
member.returns: A paging filter with a cursor for the next page.

member.name: M:SharpOfClans.Paging.PagingExtensions.PreviousPage(SharpOfClans.Paging.Paging)
member.summary: Creates a paging filter with the marker for the previous page.
member.param: The paging returned by a previous endpoint call.
member.returns: A paging filter with a cursor for the previous page.

member.name: T:SharpOfClans.Paging.PagingFilter
member.summary: Used to navigate through CoC's API responses that contain paging.

member.name: P:SharpOfClans.Paging.PagingFilter.Limit
member.summary: Limit the number of items returned in the response.

member.name: P:SharpOfClans.Paging.PagingFilter.After
member.summary: Return only items that occur after this marker. Before marker can be found from the response, inside the 'paging' property.
member.remarks: Note that only after or before can be specified for a request, not both.

member.name: P:SharpOfClans.Paging.PagingFilter.Before
member.summary: Return only items that occur before this marker. Before marker can be found from the response, inside the 'paging' property.
member.remarks: Note that only after or before can be specified for a request, not both.

member.name: M:SharpOfClans.Paging.PagingFilter.ToDictionary
member.summary: Creates a dictionary according to the values in the class' properties.
member.returns: A dictionary where the key and value are the property name and it's value respectively.
